DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study test whether Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( TMS ) may alleviate symptom Complex Regional Pain Syndrome ( CRPS ) . The investigator test various method TMS small pilot study investigate method may clinical potential . This small pilot study determine feasibility signal potentially inform future trial .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 old 2 . Diagnosis CRPS ( complex regional pain syndrome ) 3 . Average pain level report Numerical Rating Scale meet entry criterion 4 . Ability perform experimental task procedure . 1 . MRI contraindication ( metal implant device , claustrophobia ) 2 . TMS Contraindication ( eg metal implant device near site stimulation ) 3 . History epilepsy 4 . History psychological psychiatric disorder would interfere study procedure , discretion researcher . 5 . Neurologic illness would interfere brain integrity 6 . Current medical condition medication use would interfere study procedure data integrity , discretion researcher . 7 . Currently pregnant plan become pregnant . 8 . On go legal action disability claim .
